place stood a bronze pedestal supporting
a group representing a large strong man
whose majestic head was covered with a
crowned helmet a blue garment protruded
through the meshes of this golden armor
in one hand he held a white staff
bearing certain characters the other
hand he extended toward a beautiful
woman his companion wore no garment but
a son radiated from her breast her right
hand held three Globes joined by golden
rings a coronet of red flowers confined
her beautiful hair she sprang into the
air and seemed to lift with her the
warrior accompanied her both were borne
up by the clouds about a group on the
capitals of four white marble columns
were set for bronze statues they had
wings and appeared to sound trumpets I
crossed the place and mounting on a
marble platform which would before me I
noticed with astonishment that I had
reentered the Hall of the thrones the
first in which I had found myself when
entering the palace of wisdom the
triangular altar was still in the center
of this Hall but the bird the alternate
torch were joined in formed a single
body near there was a golden Sun the
sward which I had brought from the Hall
of fire lay a few paces distance on the
cush
one of the Thrones I took up the sword
and struck the Sun reducing it to dust I
then touched it and each molecule became
a Golden Sun like the one I had broken
at that instant a loud and melodious
voice exclaimed the work is perfect
hearing this the children of light
hasten to join me the doors of
immortality were opened to me and the
cloud which covers the eyes of the
mortals were dissipated I saw and the
spirits which preside over the elements
knew me for their master finis
you
